theExplorer:TransmogPotion.NAME: Transmog Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform a non-boss enemy into a random researched enemy.

theExplorer:AnimalPotion.NAME: Animal Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Evolve your companion until end of combat.
